00022 /**
00023  * @file   ProbesetGenotypeEngine.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Wed Mar 22 16:01:09 2006
00026  * 
00027  * @brief Core routines for probeset-genotype binaries. By separating the
00028  * command line parsing form the computation we allow a GUI application to share
00029  * the core computation once setting up the option class. To run the algorithm
00030  * setup the Options class appropriately for a particular run (i.e. specify
00031  * files and parameters) then call probesetGenotype() to perform analysis.
00032  */
00033 #ifndef _PROBESETGENOTYPEENGINE_H_
00034 #define _PROBESETGENOTYPEENGINE_H_
